arguments.description: The top-left X coord of the area to take the screenshot of.
arguments.name: x

arguments.description: The top-left Y coord of the area to take the screenshot of.
arguments.name: y

arguments.description: The width of the area to take the screenshot of.
arguments.name: w

arguments.description: The height of the area to take the screenshot of.
arguments.name: h

shortDescription: Takes a screenshot of the canvas (without the cursor), and returns it's imagedata.
